name: Redemption Cemetery: Curse of the Raven
storyline: After getting into a car accident, you wander into a mysterious graveyard while searching for help. The doors slam shut behind you and you realize that you are trapped! Escape from the eerie Redemption Cemetery by helping trapped spirits save their loved ones, and free their souls! Use your Hidden Object skills to help these ghosts and escape, in Redemption Cemetery – Curse of the Raven!
summary: Redemption Cemetery: Curse of the Raven is a hidden objects game.
